original_text: that God was reconciling the world to himself in Christ, not counting people’s sins against them. And he has committed to us the message of reconciliation.
korean_text: 곧 하나님께서 그리스도 안에 계시사 세상을 자기와 화목하게 하시며 그들의 죄를 그들에게 돌리지 아니하시고 화목하게 하는 말씀을 우리에게 부탁하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: that God was reconciling the world to himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 자기 자신에게 세상을 화해시키고 계셨다는 것

sentences.original_text: not counting people's sins against them
And he has committed to us
